Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First lets define the activities well use based on the description For both models ReceiveApplication DataCompletenessCheck RequestMoreInfo SkillAssessment ManagerialReview FinalDecision For the first model with potential unfairness We have an XOR branch after the SkillAssessment

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Steps in order 1 ReceiveApplication 2 DataCompletenessCheck If incomplete RequestMoreInfo loop back If complete proceed to SkillAssessment 3 SkillAssessment 4 Then for the unfair model XOR choice Option A CulturalFitCheck Option B CommunityAffiliationCheck 5 Then regardless ManagerialReview 6 FinalDecision

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: note the loop for data completeness After initial resume parsing data check if missing ask more info loop back to data check LOOP A B execute A then either exit or execute B and then A again model loop operator OperatorPOWL operator Operator LOOP children data_check request_info

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Model 1 with unfairness loop_data OperatorPOWL LOOP data_check request_info xor_branch OperatorPOWL XOR cultural_fit community_check root StrictPartialOrder nodes receive loop_data skill_assessment xor_branch managerial_review final_decision add edges receive to loop_data loop_data to skill_assessment skill_assessment to xor_branch xor_branch to managerial_review managerial_review to final_decision

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Model 2 without unfairness same loop_data skill_assessment then cultural_fit no XOR root StrictPartialOrder nodes receive loop_data skill_assessment cultural_fit managerial_review final_decision edges receive to loop_data loop_data to skill_assessment skill_assessment to cultural_fit cultural_fit to managerial_review managerial_review to final_decision

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Implementation create separate transitions for each model loop operators root partial orders add edges This models the control flow with loop XOR in model1 sequential in model2

Name: Validation - PE
Text: This matches the description process includes loops to ensure data completeness XOR choices for different paths sequential ordering Model1 demonstrates unfairness via XOR branch Model2 removes it all applicants same CulturalFitCheck
